metadata.title: Leo Jansen | Web Projects Portfolio
metadata.description: Explore the web projects portfolio of Leonardo Jansen. A collection of modern applications built with cutting-edge technologies such as Next.js.

hero.lightMessage: Being present is different from being visible.

about.quoteHtml: “Programming is not just a vocation for me. It's what I was born to do. Every time I get involved in a project and start coding, I feel that my purpose in life is to be in contact with algorithms.”

metadata.title: Tailored Web Solutions | Leo Jansen
metadata.description: Explore curated solution packages delivered by Leonardo Jansen: discovery, modernisation, and long-term engineering partnerships.

hero.title: Product-first web experiences for teams that move fast.
hero.subtitle: From strategy to delivery, I plug into your roadmap to design, build, and ship ambitious user experiences powered by Next.js.

pillars.title: Launch-ready product foundations
pillars.description: Transform ideas into validated prototypes and production-grade applications.
bullets: Discovery sessions to translate business goals into actionable scope
Design systems and UX flows ready for cross-team collaboration
MVP delivery with CI/CD, analytics, and documentation

pillars.title: Modernisation without downtime
pillars.description: Upgrade legacy stacks while keeping customers online.
bullets: Progressive migrations from SPA or CMS setups to Next.js
Performance auditing with actionable Core Web Vitals fixes
Accessibility remediation aligned with WCAG 2.2 AA

pillars.title: Long-term engineering partnership
pillars.description: Embed a senior engineer who ships features and mentors in-house teams.
bullets: Flexible retainer for roadmap execution and emergency support
Pair programming, reviews, and knowledge sharing rituals
Transparent velocity tracking and quarterly planning

cta.title: Let’s design the next solution together
cta.description: Tell me about your product vision, and we’ll shape a roadmap that fits your timeline and budget.

metadata.title: Projects & Case Studies | Leo Jansen
metadata.description: Dive into shipped products, experiments, and migrations built with Leonardo Jansen for startups and innovation teams.

hero.title: Shipping polished products your users feel instantly.
hero.subtitle: From prototypes to platform refreshes, these collaborations blend product thinking with reliable engineering execution.

projectsPage.intro: Each project starts with understanding the problem deeply, aligning stakeholders, and then iterating quickly with production-ready code.

caseStudies.heading: Selected collaborations
caseStudies.description: A snapshot of engagements that helped teams move faster, de-risk launches, and create modern experiences.

cta.title: Have a challenge that needs momentum?
cta.description: Whether you need a partner for a new product or help evolving an existing platform, let's map the next milestone together.

metadata.title: About Leonardo Jansen | Product-focused Engineer
metadata.description: Understand the journey, values, and approach Leonardo brings to every collaboration as a senior web engineer.

hero.title: Engineering becomes meaningful when it solves human problems.
hero.subtitle: I'm Leonardo Jansen, a web engineer focused on translating complex requirements into clear, delightful experiences.

bio.title: Hybrid skill set
bio.body: I bridge product strategy, UX collaboration, and hands-on engineering to help teams deliver end-to-end web experiences.

bio.title: Crafted with intent
bio.body: My process mixes rapid prototyping, rigorous code quality, and user-first storytelling to ensure the product vision remains intact.

bio.title: Continuous learning
bio.body: From performance budgets to accessibility best practices, I keep iterating on my toolkit so each project benefits from the latest capabilities.

values.heading: Principles I work by
items: Lead with empathy for users and teammates.
Prefer clarity over cleverness in both code and communication.
Ship iteratively, measure outcomes, and keep improving.

timeline.title: Foundations in front-end craft
timeline.description: Started as a UI developer, mastering HTML, CSS, and the principles of accessible design.

timeline.title: Product engineering in SaaS
timeline.description: Led feature squads, integrating design systems, analytics, and marketing automation.

timeline.title: Next.js specialist for high-growth teams
timeline.description: Partnering with startups and enterprises to deliver resilient web applications at scale.

cta.title: Let's build something users remember
cta.description: Share your product vision and I’ll help outline the path from discovery to launch.

clients.heading: Projects & Collaborations
clients.intro: My passion for solving problems has led me to collaborate on impactful projects and create innovative solutions.

projects.title: Project Name
projects.description: A brief description of the project's goal and the core technology behind it.

projects.title: Another Project
projects.description: Description of an open-source contribution, a personal project, or freelance work.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? Reach out and let's build something great together.

unclaimedTerritory.title: I don't just create websites. I create high-value digital experiences.
unclaimedTerritory.subtitle: There is an unexplored market waiting for your company. Remove the four blockers standing in the way.

blocks.title: The Social Hostage
blocks.description: Your business rents space on Instagram. When the algorithm shifts, you disappear. Social platforms are borrowed land.

blocks.title: The Digital Ghost
blocks.description: No Google presence, no urgent clients. You're invisible to buyers who need you right now with budget in hand.

blocks.title: The Generic Brand
blocks.description: Amateur visuals block premium pricing. Your brand must radiate authority and luxury to escape price wars.

blocks.title: The Exhausted Seller
blocks.description: Stop repeating the basics on WhatsApp. Automate first-touch conversations and receive only ready-to-buy leads.
